Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: யான்நோக்கும் காலை நிலன்நோக்கும் நோக்காக்கால்தான்நோக்கி மெல்ல நகும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: When I look, she looks down; when I do not, she looks and smiles gently.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A lover ('யான்') and his beloved are shown in a garden or courtyard.
Layered_Composition.Midground: A two-stage action is depicted. In the first stage, he is looking directly at her ('யான் நோக்கும் காலை'). In response, she looks demurely at the ground ('நிலன் நோக்கும்').
Layered_Composition.Background: In the second stage, he deliberately looks away from her ('நோக்காக் கால்'). The moment he does this, she lifts her head, looks directly at him ('தான் நோக்கி'), and a beautiful, gentle, secret smile blossoms on her face ('மெல்ல நகும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A description of the subtle, flirtatious game of glances between lovers: she looks down when he looks at her, but secretly looks and smiles at him the moment he looks away.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The 'dance' of their gazes is the entire story. Her secret smile is the reward for his patience and understanding of the game. It is a private communication meant only for him, which happens when no one (not even he, directly) is looking.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A soft, romantic, natural light. Her final, secret smile should be the most radiant and beautifully lit moment in the scene, a small, private treasure.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that cleverly captures both characters, allowing the viewer to see both his gaze and her counter-gaze in succession. A subtle rack focus could be used.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, focusing on the subtle, fleeting expressions.

Cultural_Anchors: When I look, she looks at the ground (யான் நோக்கும் காலை நிலன் நோக்கும்)
When I don't look, she looks at me and smiles softly (நோக்காக் கால் தான் நோக்கி மெல்ல நகும்)

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: both staring at each other, angry expressions, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Focus on capturing the beauty of her 'secret smile'.
